updates.title: Notion 2.52: Everything is database
updates.description: From clearer names and cleaner tables to simpler settings, gentler visuals, and fewer distractions, databases just got much simpler! The new ‚Äú+ property‚Äù makes naming and picking a property much smoother. You can now group, insert, or rename properties right from the property menu. Web, desktop, mobile‚Äîall refreshed! See the full list of updates.

updates.description: Now Notion AI can answer extra-complex questions about your databases, drawing info from across properties and any notes inside your database pages. For example, ‚ÄúWhich accounts in @Sales CRM have call notes that mention European data residency?‚Äù

updates.title: Notion‚Äôs #2 most requested feature is nearly here! (#1 is offline mode, also coming !) You‚Äôll be abl...
updates.description: Notion‚Äôs #2 most requested feature is nearly here! (#1 is offline mode, also coming !) You‚Äôll be able to grant permissions by database row. The person assigned to those database pages won‚Äôt be able to see the rest of the database. Stay tuned.

updates.title: Have 17,362 messages in your Gmail inbox? Notion AI can help. Search through older archives and new ...
updates.description: Have 17,362 messages in your Gmail inbox? Notion AI can help. Search through older archives and new emails to get the latest updates on a project or summarize a long thread. We maintain strict privacy controls, so each user can only see their own inbox. Available on Business and Enterprise plans.

updates.title: Managing projects in Linear? Notion AI can now search those projects and issues‚Äîincluding titles, as...
updates.description: Managing projects in Linear? Notion AI can now search those projects and issues‚Äîincluding titles, assignees, creators, and comments. Ask questions like, ‚ÄúWhat blockers are assigned to me this week?‚Äù and get instant answers with citations, all while respecting your Linear permissions. Available on Business and Enterprise plans.

updates.title: Now you can select which Notion Property Type you want to use for each CSV column, making imports so...
